name: jsxlsxio
description: Node.js wrapper of xlsxio library to manipulate Excel files

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.rebuild:debug: npm run clean && npm run compile:debug
scripts.rebuild:i686: npm run clean && npm run compile:i686
scripts.rebuild:i686-debug: npm run clean && npm run compile:i686-debug

author: Guillaume Pirou <guillaume.pirou@epitech.eu>
